--- "Gordon Mohr (Internet Archive)"
<gojomo@...> wrote:

> A feature recently introduced (in CVS HEAD) to work
> around
> another DNSJava-related limitation might help in
> your case,
> as well. See:
> 
>   
>
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1116204&group_id=73833&atid=539099
> 
> If you set the 'accept-non-dns-resolves' expert
> setting of
> the FetchDNS processor to true, Heritrix will fall
> back to
> nativelocal name lookups, rather than using DNS
> itself. This
> might succeed where DNSJava is failing, allowing
> your crawl
> to proceed.
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
> 

Thx for the suggestion we tried it on my friends
computer (with the german version of Windows XP
installed) and well it seems to work now (standalone
it works now). I'll have to integrate it into our
project and we'll see if it works... I'll keep you
informed about the progress!

Christoph
